message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire it at a fair price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9,500.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to pay a bit less. Would you be willing to accept $8,500 for the product? I'm confident this is a fair price for both of us.

I understand you're looking to pay a bit less, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to the value you place on the product. I'm now offering it to you for $9,000.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but I'm still a little too high for my budget.  How about $8,750? I'm sure we can find a solution that works for both of us.

I understand you're trying to find a sweet spot, but I still need to get closer to the value you place on the product. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I need to make a profit. I'm now offering it to you for $9,250.
I'm getting closer to your price point, but I'm still aiming for something a bit lower. Would you consider $9,000? I'm confident this price will make us both happy.

I think we're getting close, but I still need to get a bit closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you at $9,250, but I need to get a bit more out of this deal. I'm now offering it to you for $9,375.
